texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["As Christmas approaches, London becomes busier with shoppers and party-goers. Between Sunday 23 December 2018 and Tuesday 1 January 2019, most of our services will be running. There will be some service changes and planned work on parts of the public transport and road networks."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Between Saturday 22 December 2018 and Tuesday 1 January 2019, planned works and service changes may affect your journey.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["No services on Christmas Day except for \u003ca href=\"/modes/cycling/santander-cycles\"\u003eSantander Cycles\u003c/a\u003e , \u003ca href=\"/modes/dial-a-ride/index\"\u003eDial-a-Ride\u003c/a\u003e (for registered members only), \u003ca href=\"/modes/taxis-and-minicabs/index\"\u003eTaxi and Private Hire\u003c/a\u003e and \u003ca href=\"/modes/coaches/index\"\u003ecoaches\u003c/a\u003e which are available throughout the Christmas period","No London Overground, TfL Rail or Thames Clippers services on Boxing Day","Dial-a-Ride services will run throughout the Christmas season (for registered members), but are limited on certain days and are \u003ca href=\"/cdn/static/cms/documents/in-touch-leaflet-2019-a4-1nov.pdf\"\u003esubject to different booking dates\u003c/a\u003e ","Changes to frequency and timetable of most services during this period"]}
There will be free travel on TfL services from 23:45 on New Year's Eve until 04.30 on New Year's Day (except on Thames Clippers and Emirates Air Line ).
Check before you travel and plan ahead using our travel tools. See:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["The latest \u003ca href=\"http://tfl.gov.uk/traffic/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future%20date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2018-12-14T00%3A00%3A00\u0026endDate=2018-12-14T23%3A59%3A59\u0026disruptionIds=TIMS-202397\u0026intcmp=56354\"\u003estatus updates\u003c/a\u003e for Tube, rail, DLR and Trams"," \u003ca href=\"http://tfl.gov.uk/traffic/status/\"\u003eStatus updates\u003c/a\u003e for roads"," \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/plan-a-journey/\"\u003ePlan a journey\u003c/a\u003e , which can help you plan your route by public transport, cycling or walking"," \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/maps?Input=Current+location+\"\u003eNearby\u003c/a\u003e , which uses your current location or a postcode or address of your choice and places you on a map, showing you Tube, bus, river, London Overground, DLR, TfL Rail and Santander Cycles locations around you"," \u003ca href=\"http://twitter.com/tfltrafficnews\"\u003e@TfLTrafficNews\u003c/a\u003e as well as the \u003ca href=\"http://m.me/tfltravelbot\"\u003eTfL Travelbot\u003c/a\u003e on Facebook Messenger","Our \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/travel-information/social-media-and-email-updates/email-updates\"\u003eemail updates\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Find out more about travelling on the following days:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":[" \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/sunday-23-december-2018\"\u003eSunday 23 December\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/christmas-eve-2018\"\u003eChristmas Eve\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/christmas-day-2018\"\u003eChristmas Day\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/boxing-day-2018\"\u003eBoxing Day\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/thursday-27-december-2018\"\u003eThursday 27 December\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/friday-28-december-2018\"\u003eFriday 28 December\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/saturday-29-december-2018\"\u003eSaturday 29 December\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/sunday-30-december-2018\"\u003eSunday 30 December\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/new-year-s-eve-2018\"\u003eNew Year's Eve\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/new-year-s-day-2019\"\u003eNew Year's Day\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/wednesday-2-january-2019\"\u003eWednesday 2 January\u003c/a\u003e "]}
All information is subject to change. We'll be updating this page regularly with more detail of what's running over Christmas and New Year.
